name: iChess - Chess for your iPhone
description:
*** IMPORTANT: If you are running iOS 9 or iOS 10 do not purchase this version. Please download iChess 2 instead. ***

iChess is a Chess-Simulator for your iPhone, with difficulty levels that can be adjusted to suit the skills of the individual player. For this reason, iChess is suitable for all types of players, from absolute beginners who want to learn the game, right up to professional-level players seeking a real challenge.

High-Level Artificial Intelligence:
Extremely strong Chess-Engine that provides even professional players with a challenge

Single-Player Mode:
Play against the Chess-Computer in single-player mode

Multi-Player Mode:
In multi-player mode, you can compete against all of your friends

Adjustable Difficulty Level:
The level of difficulty can be continuously adjusted between 1 and 100

Different Engine Play-Modes:
Choose from five different Chess-Computer playing styles

Ideal For Beginners Too:
Displays legal moves and comments

Intuitive Controls:
Move the figures exactly as if they're on a real Chessboard.
